sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './JobPortal.css'; const JobPortal = ({ user, onLogout }) => { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [selectedJob, setSelectedJob] = useState(null); const [resumeFile, setResumeFile] = useState(null); const jobs = [ { id: 1, title: 'AWS Cloud Engineer', company: 'TechCorp Solutions', location: 'Vadodara, Gujarat', experience: '2-4 years', skills: ['AWS', 'EC2', 'S3', 'Lambda', 'CloudFormation'], description: 'Looking for an experienced AWS Cloud Engineer to design and implement cloud solutions.' }, { id: 2, title: 'DevOps Engineer', company: 'InnovateTech', location: 'Remote', experience: '3-5 years', skills: ['AWS', 'Docker', 'Kubernetes', 'Jenkins', 'Terraform'], description: 'Join our DevOps team to build and maintain CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure.' }, { id: 3, title: 'Full Stack Developer', company: 'StartupHub', location: 'Ahmedabad, Gujarat', experience: '1-3 years', skills: ['React', 'Node.js', 'AWS', 'MongoDB', 'JavaScript'], description: 'Develop modern web applications using React and Node.js with AWS cloud services.' }, { id: 4, title: 'Solutions Architect', company: 'CloudFirst Inc', location: 'Bangalore, Karnataka', experience: '5+ years', skills: ['AWS', 'Architecture Design', 'Microservices', 'API Gateway', 'RDS'], description: 'Design scalable cloud architectures and guide technical implementation for enterprise clients.' } ]; const handleApply = (job) => { setSelectedJob(job); }; const handleCloseModal = () => { setSelectedJob(null); }; const handleSubmitApplication = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!resumeFile) { alert('Please upload your resume'); return; } alert('Application submitted successfully!'); setSelectedJob(null); setResumeFile(null); }; const handleResumeChange = (e) => { setResumeFile(e.target.files[0]); }; return (

Job Portal

AWS UG Vadodara Community Day

Available Opportunities

Explore exciting career opportunities from our community partners

{jobs.map((job) => (

{job.title}

{job.company}
Location: {job.location}
Experience: {job.experience}
{job.skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}

{job.description}

))}
{selectedJob && (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Apply for {selectedJob.title}
